trans-unit.source: Defines which views will be available in the Frontend. The first view listed will be the default view on the page.
trans-unit.target: Defines which views will be available in the Frontend. The first view listed will be the default view on the page.

trans-unit.source: The name of the calendar. This will be the Header displayed throughout the views.
trans-unit.target: Le nom du calendrier. Ce sera l'en-tête affiché pour les différentes vues.

trans-unit.source: Allows subscriptions to an event so that subscribers are notified of any event changes. Subscriptions can require a login or be available for all visitors.
trans-unit.target: Allows subscriptions to an event so that subscribers are notified of any event changes. Subscriptions can require a login or be available for all visitors.

trans-unit.source: Require anonymous frontend users to fill out a CAPTCHA before subscribing.
trans-unit.target: Require anonymous frontend users to fill out a CAPTCHA before subscribing.

trans-unit.source: Sets the week to start on Sunday or Monday.
trans-unit.target: Fait commencer la semaine le dimanche ou le lundi.

trans-unit.source: Determines how calendar selections are interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Determines how calendar selections are interpreted.

trans-unit.source: Show All (don't care about selection below): All calendars will be shown. Show only selected calendars: Limits the display to only the selected calendars. Don't show selected calendars: Shows all calendars except those that have been selected.
trans-unit.target: Show All (don't care about selection below): All calendars will be shown. Show only selected calendars: Limits the display to only the selected calendars. Don't show selected calendars: Shows all calendars except those that have been selected.

trans-unit.source: The selected calendars.
trans-unit.target: Les calendriers sélectionnés.

trans-unit.source: Determines how category selections are interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Determines how category selections are interpreted.

trans-unit.source: Show All (don't care about selection below): All categories will be shown. Show only selected categories: Limits the display to only the selected categories. Don't show selected categories: Shows all categories except those that have been selected.
trans-unit.target: Show All (don't care about selection below): All categories will be shown. Show only selected categories: Limits the display to only the selected categories. Don't show selected categories: Shows all categories except those that have been selected.

trans-unit.source: The selected categories.
trans-unit.target: Les catégories sélectionnées.

trans-unit.source: Page where year view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.
trans-unit.target: Page where year view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.

trans-unit.source: Page where month view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.
trans-unit.target: Page sur laquelle la vue Mois est configurée. Si aucune valeur n'est paramétrée ici ou dans le Typoscript, la page courante est utilisée.

trans-unit.source: Shows a list of events in the current month underneath the normal month view.
trans-unit.target: Affiche une liste d'évènements dans le mois courant sous la vue Mois normale.

trans-unit.source: Displays the month view as a mini calendar with links to day and week view but no event display in the month view.
trans-unit.target: Affiche la vue Mois sous forme d'un mini calendrier avec des liens vers les vues Jour et Semaine mais sans afficher les évènements dans la vue Mois.

trans-unit.source: Page where week view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.
trans-unit.target: Page where week view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.

trans-unit.source: Page where day view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.
trans-unit.target: Page where day view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.

trans-unit.source: Earliest time that day view displays events.
trans-unit.target: Earliest time that day view displays events.

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the times that events can be created, only their display within day view.
trans-unit.target: This does not affect the times that events can be created, only their display within day view.

trans-unit.source: Latest time that day view displays events.
trans-unit.target: Latest time that day view displays events.

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the times that events can be created, only their display within day view.
trans-unit.target: This does not affect the times that events can be created, only their display within day view.

trans-unit.source: Determins how day view divides the displayed hours.
trans-unit.target: Determins how day view divides the displayed hours.

trans-unit.source: Page where list view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.
trans-unit.target: Page where list view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.

trans-unit.source: The day and time to start displaying events in list view.
trans-unit.target: The day and time to start displaying events in list view.

trans-unit.source: The day and time to stop displaying events in list view.
trans-unit.target: The day and time to stop displaying events in list view.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of events to show in list view, regardless of time settings.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of events to show in list view, regardless of time settings.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times to show the same recurring event in list view.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of times to show the same recurring event in list view.

trans-unit.source: This setting can be very useful when you have a frequent recurring event that overpowers everything else in the list view.
trans-unit.target: This setting can be very useful when you have a frequent recurring event that overpowers everything else in the list view.

trans-unit.source: Set whether the page browser is used or events are shown in one, single page list.
trans-unit.target: Set whether the page browser is used or events are shown in one, single page list.

trans-unit.source: The number of records to display per page when the page browser is enabled.
trans-unit.target: The number of records to display per page when the page browser is enabled.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of pages to display using the page browser.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of pages to display using the page browser.

trans-unit.source: Page where event view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.
trans-unit.target: Page where event view is configured. If no value is set here or in Typoscript, the current page is used.

trans-unit.source: Enables an abbreviated event preview page before the full event details are shown.
trans-unit.target: Enables an abbreviated event preview page before the full event details are shown.

trans-unit.source: Displays links to ICS files for calendars, categories, and events.
trans-unit.target: Affiche les liens des fichiers ICS des calendriers, catégories, et évènements.

trans-unit.source: This option only enables the links. You must still include the ICS static template and configure it according to the manual.
trans-unit.target: This option only enables the links. You must still include the ICS static template and configure it according to the manual.

trans-unit.source: Shows a login box in the calendar sidebar or below the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Affiche une boîte d'identification à côté ou en dessous du calendrier.

trans-unit.source: Shows a search box in the calendar sidebar or below the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Affiche un champ de recherche à côté ou en dessous du calendrier.

trans-unit.source: Shows "jump" dropdowns to quickly navigate to other month, weeks, and years.
trans-unit.target: Shows "jump" dropdowns to quickly navigate to other month, weeks, and years.

trans-unit.source: Adds checkboxes to the legend so that the user can filter which categories appear on the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Ajoute des cases à cocher à la légende afin que l'utilisateur puisse filtrer les catégories à afficher sur le calendrier.

trans-unit.source: Displays events for the next day in the sidebar.
trans-unit.target: Displays events for the next day in the sidebar.

trans-unit.source: Custom Typoscript that only applies to this instance of the plugin.
trans-unit.target: Custom Typoscript that only applies to this instance of the plugin.
